name: FA_CASE_SERVICE_AREAS
description: This table contains the service areas covered by a financial assistance case.

columns.name: FIN_ASST_CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the case record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: FA_CASE_SERV_AREA_ID
columns.description: Service areas covered by a financial assistance case
